{{Lang|'''Sasayuri'''|ja=笹百合|ja_rm=Sasayuri}} was a cherished [[tengu]] general from [[Inazuma]] who served the [[Ei|Raiden Shogun]] and was killed during a civil war between the Shogun and the people of the Great Serpent [[Orobashi]] from [[Watatsumi Island]].<ref>{{Ref/Book|Sangonomiya Chronicles}}</ref>

Sasayuri is depicted alongside the Raiden Shogun, [[Mikoshi Chiyo]], and the [[Kitsune Saiguu]] in [[:File:Character Teaser - "Raiden Shogun- Nightmare" - Genshin Impact|Character Teaser - "Raiden Shogun: Nightmare."]] Of them, Sasayuri is the first to disappear from the picnic ground after Raiden recollects the battle against Orobashi.

==Trivia==
* {{Lang|Sasayuri|ja=笹百合}} is Japanese for the ''Lilium japonicum'', also known as the bamboo lily.
